messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 16 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, and Reza. Wim is connected to Amir, Raj, Jing, and Eva. Raj is connected to Amir, Wim, Jing, and Wei. Jing is also connected to Amir, Wim, Raj, and Pam. Wei is connected to Nisha, Reza, Kim, and Raj. Nisha is connected to Wei, Reza, Kim, and Sara. Reza is connected to Amir, Kim, Nisha, and Wei. Kim is also connected to Wei, Nisha, Reza, and Moin. Ian is connected to Moin, Puja, Sara, and Matt. Moin is connected to Ian, Puja, Kim, and Sara. Puja is connected to Pari, Ian, Sara, and Moin. Sara is also connected to Ian, Moin, Puja, and Nisha. Pari is connected to Pam, Matt, Eva, and Puja. Pam is connected to Jing, Pari, Matt, and Eva. Matt is connected to Pari, Pam, Eva, and Ian. Eva is also connected to Pari, Pam, Matt, and Wim. From Amir what is the shortest path to Eva? Starting from Amir, please list the scholar numbers in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

I am an AI-assistant chatbot trained to assist human users by providing helpful and harmless responses. Please provide me with a task and I will do my best to assist you. 

Here is the list of scholars, their connections, and the shortest path from Amir to Eva: 

1. Amir, connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, and Reza
2. Wim, connected to Amir, Raj, Jing, and Eva
3. Raj, connected to Amir, Wim, Jing, and Wei
4. Jing, connected to Amir, Wim, Raj, and Pam
5. Wei, connected to Nisha, Reza, Kim, and Raj
6. Nisha, connected to Wei, Reza, Kim, and Sara
7. Reza, connected to Amir, Kim, Nisha, and Wei
8. Kim, connected to Wei, Nisha, Reza, and Moin
9. Ian, connected to Moin, Puja, Sara, and Matt
10. Moin, connected to Ian, Puja, Kim, and Sara
11. Puja, connected to Pari, Ian, Sara, and Moin
12. Sara, connected to Ian, Moin, Puja, and Nisha
13. Pari, connected to Pam, Matt, Eva, and Puja
14. Pam, connected to Jing, Pari, Matt, and Eva
15. Matt, connected to Pari, Pam, Eva, and Ian
16. Eva, connected to Pari, Pam, Matt, and Wim

The shortest path from Amir to Eva is through Wim, Matt, and Eva. 

I hope this helps!
